snippet: San Francisco sued Nevada in 2013 amid reports that patients discharged from Rawson-Neal Psychiatric Hospital in Las Vegas were bused to California and directed to seek services there.
abstract: Nevada Board of Examiners approves $400,000 payment to San Francisco, Calif, in response to 2013 suit filed by city for sending recently discharged psychiatric patients from Rawson Neal Psychiatric Hospital in Las Vegas to San Francisco via bus and instructing them to find care there.
lead_paragraph: San Francisco sued Nevada in 2013 amid reports that patients discharged from Rawson-Neal Psychiatric Hospital in Las Vegas were bused to California and directed to seek services there.

headline.print_headline: Nevada: $400,000 Payment Approved in Case of Patients Sent Away
headline.main: Nevada: $400,000 Payment Approved in Case of Patients Sent Away
